Class DefaultEdgeRenderer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container

              org.jgraph.graph.EdgeRenderer
                  gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.jgraph.DefaultEdgeRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, org.jgraph.graph.CellViewRenderer
public class DefaultEdgeRenderer
extends org.jgraph.graph.EdgeRenderer

This class defines a customized edge renderer class to customized highlight (selected) edge rendering.

Since:
CMTS v1.0
See Also:
Serialized Form
